Generated with 1.5.1 (AddComponentToEnterpriseApplicationOp has not changed)

Most of the manipulation of the EARArtifactEdit is contained within a null check , however, the call to saveIfNecessary() is not - why a null EARArtifactEdit is being generated in this context (creation of an EJB project w/ associated EAR) is a separate issue...
